text: Pekka Antero Leimu (born 11 April 1947) is a Finnish former ice hockey center and Olympian. Leimu played with Team Finland at the 1968 Winter Olympics held in Grenoble, France. He previously played for Ilves Tampere in SM- Liiga.Society for International Hockey Research Database, retrieved June 29, 2015 ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Ice hockey players at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Finland Category:Ice hockey players from Tampere Category:Ilves players Category:Finnish ice hockey centres
title: Pekka Leimu
